DOC.brief_summary: The Eluna Family / Sentus BP Master Study is designed to confirm the safety of the new Eluna pacemaker family and the Sentus BP (bipolar) left ventricular lead. Furthermore the new wandless RF telemetry function "SafeSync" and the handling of the Sentus lead during implantation will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Eluna Family / Sentus BP Master Study
